reviewComments: We left Bangalore at 6am on 9th October 2016. Reached Farmer’s Son Resort Via Hassan around 11am. On the way we stopped at Kamat hotel for breakfast. We were 11 membered group... read more
Group of friends went with sudden plan at late night...place is awesome surrounded by forest and plantation...off road we had spotted many rabbits nd peacock. stay was arranged... read more
